籤詩版本二:
The longest day in summer
Everyone is very worried about the heat and depression
Heaven and earth also know what people want
The cool breeze blows naturally
詩意: This hexagram indicates that everyone is worried about heat. Do whatever you want.
解曰: There is no doubt about whether to advance or retreat. Have a good time. Is it for camping? No need to act rashly.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kong Ming enters Sichuan
Zhuge Liang (181-234), courtesy name Kongming, was a native of Yangdu, Langya (now Yinan County, Shandong Province), and was the prime minister of Shu Han (Liu Bei) during the Three Kingdoms period.
Although Liu Bei won Jingzhou, it was not enough to separate one side. Zhuge Kongming planned to capture Xichuan to increase Liu Bei's territory. At this time, Liu Zhang in Yizhou was attacked by Zhang Lu in the north. Zhuge Kongming learned that Liu Zhang wanted to dedicate the map of Xichuan to Cao Cao in order to protect himself. When Zhang Song (Liu Zhang's subordinate) met Cao Cao, because Cao Cao was arrogant and rude, Liu Zhang took the map back to Xichuan and passed Jingzhou on the way. Kong Ming had already been waiting for him on the way and invited him to Jingzhou, but he never mentioned the Xichuan Picture until the time of departure. Zhang Song was grateful to Kong Ming for his courtesy and hospitality, so he dedicated the Xichuan Picture to him.
Xichuan's terrain was dangerous and could be attacked or defended. After Kong Ming's various arrangements, Xichuan became the birthplace of Liu Bei.
(Kong Ming treated people with courtesy and easily obtained the coveted Xichuan.)
聖意:
House and home pray for blessings.
Beware of yourself (there is good luck among bad things).
Seeking wealth and good fortune.
Transactions are normal.
Marriage.
Liujia: Give birth to a boy.
Pedestrians move.
Field silkworms are damaged.


Six animals are flat.
Looking for someone to meet.
Good luck in the lawsuit.
Migration Old.
Lost property North.
Disease makes a wish.
Mountain tomb is auspicious.
